You should work here because it's a great place to work. Period. That's really the gist of it: Squarespace takes excellent care of its employees. Not only do we boasts one of the most beautiful offices in the world, daily lunch, fully covered health insurance, unlimited vacation (and a recommended 4-5 weeks) and a solid 401k match, but working at Squarespace also means working with a great community of people who love design and are passionate about great products. This is a company that cares deeply about its employees and employees who care deeply about their product. We're very proud here to be building the platform that both democratizes the web and pushes forward its design.

A few of our recent hires came right from this thread!
